page.title: 01DERBYSHIRE
page.content: DERBYSHIRE. "Derbyshire is one of the country's delightful counties,not overpowering with history but filled with Nature's lovely places,packed with natural beauty in infinite variety" so writes Arthur Mee in his book "Derbyshire" from The King's England series. A place for everybody is Derbyshire, with more than a thousand square miles of wonderland almost in the heart of England. It is unique in its beauty, as changing as a flower in spring,with a freshness and tenderness which seem to hang about its hills and dales,and a haunting loveliness which rises to enchantment at its greatest heights and in its deepest solitudes.
